Sql.query: insert into trn_ing_potencia ( ingpotcodi, pericodi, emprcodi, ingpotversion, ingpotimporte, ingpotusername, ingpotfecins, ingpotfecact ) values ( :ingpotcodi, :pericodi, :emprcodi, :ingpotversion, :ingpotimporte, :ingpotusername, :ingpotfecins, :ingpotfecact )
delete from trn_ing_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and ingpotversion = :ingpotversion

select trn_ing_potencia.*, (select sum(ingpotimporte) from trn_ing_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and ingpotversion= :ingpotversion ) as Total from trn_ing_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and ingpotversion= :ingpotversion

select trn_ing_potencia.*, (select emprnomb from vw_si_empresa where emprcodi=trn_ing_potencia.emprcodi) as nombEmpresa, (select perinombre from trn_periodo where pericodi=trn_ing_potencia.pericodi) as nombPeriodo from trn_ing_potencia where (pericodi =:pericodi or :pericodi is null) and (ingpotversion =:ingpotversion or :ingpotversion is null) order by nombEmpresa asc
select * from trn_ing_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and ingpotversion = :ingpotversion
select * from trn_ing_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and ingpotversion = :ingpotversion and emprcodi = :emprcodi
